articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Syrian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Syrian Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a  friendly talk with a delegation of the Syrian Trade Unions  Federation headed by its President Mohammed Shaban Azzooz who is president of the World Federation of Trade Unions, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
					 Present there were Kim Song Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, and Muhammad Adib Al Khani, Syrian charge d' affaires ad interim to the DPRK.
					
					 At the talks the head of the delegation said that the friendly relationship between Syria and the DPRK was provided by Hafez Al-Assad and President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He emphasized that the Syrian people would stand by the Korean people in their vigorous struggle to safeguard the sovereignty of the country and achieve its reunification under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Turkmenistan
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Turkmenistan 
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Gurbankuli Berdimuhammedov, President of Turkmenistan, on Monday on the occasion of its national day.
					 In his message Kim Yong Nam wished the president of Turkmenistan great success in his noble work for the prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Turkmenistan would continue to develop on good terms.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Bulgarian Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Bulgarian Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Bulgaria headed by its Deputy Foreign Minister Radion Popov at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Myanmar FM and His Party
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Myanmar FM and His Party
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KNCA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and had a talk  with U Nyan Win, foreign minister of the Union of Myanmar, and his party, which paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Myanmar Foreign Minister Arrives
articles.content:
Myanmar Foreign Minister Arrives
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- U Nyan Win, foreign minister of Myanmar, and his party arrived here today. 
					 They were greeted at the airport by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il and officials concerned.

articles.title: Talks between Delegations of Hydro-Meteorological Service of DPRK and Chinese Ministry of Water Resources Held
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of Hydro-Meteorological Service of DPRK and Chinese Ministry of Water Resources Held
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Talks between the delegations of the Hydro-Meteorological Service of the DPRK and the Chinese Ministry of Water Resources took place here today. 
					 Present at the talks were members of the delegation of the Hydro-Meteorological Service of the DPRK headed by its Director Ko Il Hun from the DPRK side and members of the delegation of the Chinese Ministry of Water Resources headed by its Chief Engineer Liu Ning from the Chinese side. 
					
					 At the talks both sides swapped views on the issue of boosting the scientific and technological exchange and cooperation between the Hydro-Meteorological Service of the DPRK and the Chinese Ministry of Water Resources.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Affairs Institute led by its Director Jang Yun Gon left here today to visit China.
					 Meanwhile, a delegation of the General Union of Syrian Peasants led by Khaled Salameh, member of its Executive Committee, arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Whirlwind of Suppression Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Whirlwind of Suppression Slammed
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Council of Religionists in a statement issued on Monday condemned the Lee Myung Bak group for kicking up a whirlwind of fascist suppression against the progressive organizations and personages of different social standings in south Korea that supported the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and called for national reconciliation, unity and reunification, while crying out for "eliminating pro-north leftist forces."
					 This is brutal suppression of democracy and an undisguised infringement upon human rights which diametrically run counter to the faith of the religionists who aspire after justice and peace and pray for national concord and reunification, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The "pro-north leftist forces" much touted by the group of traitors are the righteous pro-reunification movement organizations and patriotic personages that have conducted activities for the democratization of the south Korean society and the independent reunification of the country, opposed to the unpopular misrule of the present conservative "government" and its moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					Nevertheless, this group has desperately wielded fascist swords against the south Korean people from all walks of life who protested against the import of beef from American mad cattle and demanded the right to existence and freedom, claiming that their righteous actions were "wire-pulled" by someone "behind the scene". This is, however, nothing but an extremely rash action which can never be justified. 
					
					 Those hell-bent on evil deeds are bound to face a severe judgment of the people.
					
					It is the common ideal and mission guided by religious belief for the religionists to value justice and not to compromise with injustice.
					
					The Korean Council of Religionists, availing itself of this opportunity, expresses expectation that all the religious organizations and religionists in south Korea will intensify the sacred patriotic struggle for decisively frustrating the fascist suppression by the group of Lee, incarnation of evil, and achieving the democratization of society and national reunification.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian photo exhibition "Monuments of Bulgaria protected by UNESCO" was opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Bulgaria.
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Ryu Sung Rim, vice-chairman of the DPRK-Bulgaria Friendship Association, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 On hand were Stoyan Gortchivkin, Bulgarian charge d' affaires a.i. here, his embassy officials and members of the delegation of the foreign ministry of the Republic of Bulgaria headed by Deputy Minister Radion Popov, on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys and officials of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Meeting with Syrian Delegation Held
articles.content:
Meeting with Syrian Delegation Held
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting between officials of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) and members of a delegation of the Syrian Trade Unions Federation was held at the Central Workers' Hall on Monday.
					 Present at the meeting were officials of the GFTUK Central Committee including its Chairman Kim Pyong Phal and members of the delegation of the Syrian Trade Unions Federation headed by its President Mohammed Shaban Azzooz who is president of the World Federation of Trade Unions.
					
					 Participants in the meeting informed each other of successes and experience gained in the activities of their organizations and conversed about the need to boost the cooperative relations.

articles.title: New Books See Light
articles.content:
New Books See Light 
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Many books were published by the Science and Encyclopedia Press of the DPRK to help working people widen scientific and technological knowledge and common sense.
					Among them are socio-scientific books including book "History of Development of Korean Calligraphy" which comprehensively deals with the history of the development of Juche-based calligraphy and the course of the development of excellent national calligraphy created by the Korean people in the ancient, medieval and modern times.
					
					 Scientific and technological books also saw the light.
					
					 Book "Companion of Software Developers" explaining essentials of computer science and system development and operation and network (internet) technology, etc. books "Intellectual Information Processing" and "Technology for the Application of Computer Multi-media" (essentials) and others introducing the concept of intellectual information processing technology and the theoretical and practical issues arising in developing the multi-media application program are helpful to widening the understanding of information science and technology.
					
					 Among the new books are also books that help readers enrich common sense and knowledge about health and medical treatment such as Part 3 Fishes of "Korean Fauna", "Korean Mineral" Vol. 7, "Dictionary of First Aid Clinical Treatment" and "Essentials of Acupuncture and Moxibustion and Differentiation of Koryo Medicine."

articles.title: Brisk Autumn Land Management Campaign in DPRK
articles.content:
Brisk Autumn Land Management Campaign in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A brisk autumn land management campaign goes on in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					What is the main in this campaign is to facelift the looks of roads, improve rivers and streams, plant good species of trees and beautify towns.
					
					Efforts are channeled to giving a new appearance to roads across the country.
					
					North Hamgyong Province is undertaking the work for widening roads, straightening curved roads and adjusting gradients in Kilju, Myongchon and other counties of the province.
					
					Successes have been made in projects for lowering river beds, repairing dikes and covering them with stones.
					
					A large-scale Singwang Stream conservation work is being done in South Hwanghae Province to protect a thousand and several hundred hectares of land under cultivation and to acquire a vast acreage of arable land.
					
					Sonchon and Cholsan Counties of North Phyongan Province which have already reinforced several sections of dykes for controlling tidewater are pouring efforts into river dike repair projects. Similar work is being carried on in Yangdok, Sinyang and other counties and towns of South Phyongan Province.
					
					Besides, provinces, cities and counties are preparing good species of tree saplings as Changsong larch to create forests and beautify cities.

articles.title: DPRK Red Cross Society
articles.content:
DPRK Red Cross Society
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The Red Cross Society of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was founded in October Juche 35 (1946).
					Its foundation made it possible for the DPRK to protect the lives of the people, promote their health and welfare and take an active part in the international humanitarian activities.
					
					True to its humanitarian mission, it is engaged in a wide range of activities such as preparations against disasters and emergency relief activities, massive public health and hygienic work for preventing all kinds of diseases and enhancing hygienic and cultural standards, social medical services, juvenile Red Cross activities, information and investigation activities and dissemination of the International Humanitarian Law among working people.
					
					 The society is making energetic efforts to improve the Red Cross activities in reliance upon broad voluntary service networks according to its own development plan and the "Strategy up to 2010" and "Singapore Declaration" of the International Federation of Red Cross.
					
					 It undertakes different activities to supply daily necessities and medicaments to disaster victims and remove consequences of damage such as restoration and building of water supply and sewage networks under the state plan for alleviating the pains of the victims and stabilizing their livelihood with the assistance and cooperation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and various national organizations in case of flood, tidal wave and typhoon.
					
					 On the other hand, it cooperates with the International Committee of the Red Cross concerning prosthetic appliances to alleviate the inconveniences of the honored disabled soldiers and the disabled and serve conveniences in their living.
					
					The adoption of the Law on the Red Cross Society in January 2007 provided a firm legal basis to carry on its activities according to the fundamental principle of the movement.
					
					 The society, as a member of the International Red Cross and Red Crescent Movement, is developing friendly and cooperative relations with international Red Cross organizations and national organizations of Red Cross and Red Crescent.
					
					 The DPRK Red Cross Society joined the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies on May 11, 1956.

articles.title: Reckless Remarks of S. Korean Puppet Minister of Defence Blasted
articles.content:
Reckless Remarks of S. Korean Puppet Minister of Defence Blasted
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- As already reported, some days ago, the United States and the south Korean puppets held the 40th south Korea-U.S. "annual security consultative meeting" in Washington at which they made public a "17-point joint statement," foolishly crying out for making "preparations to cope with an emergency situation" of somebody.
					 This comes under fire by a signed commentary of Rodong Sinmun Monday. The above-said meeting openly brought to light the wild ambition of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group to invade the north while daringly contemplating an operation against it under the pretext of "emergency situation." This reminds one of a confab discussing the operation on the eve of a provocative war both in the light of the reckless remarks made by the warmongers there and the nature of the issues discussed there, the commentary observes, and goes on:
					
					 The one more dangerous war confab staged by them in pursuance of the reckless and foolish scenario glaringly betrays an adventurous attempt to disturb peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and ignite a new war at any cost. 
					
					What merits more serious attention is that Ri Sang Hui, puppet minister of Defence, again let loose unpardonable outbursts groundlessly slandering the north at the joint press conference held at the end of the meeting.
					
					 This traitor without an equal in the world flew into the U.S. to meet his American master and let loose such unspeakable vituperation in the eyes of the world community, not content with vociferating about "emergency situation" at home. This clearly shows what intolerable extent his idea of confrontation with fellow countrymen and hysteria of a war of aggression against the north has reached.
					
					 It is quite clear that grave consequences will be entailed by Ri Sang Hui's reckless remarks. His hysteric behavior is driving the strained inter-Korean relations to an uncontrollable catastrophe. 
					
					 It is absolutely impossible to expect the improved inter-Korean relations and peaceful reunification as long as such sycophantic traitor serving the U.S., confrontational maniac and human scum as Ri Sang Hui is allowed to stay in his office. He will have to pay a price for his reckless remarks. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group would be well advised to pay heed to the warning served by the north, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Sinister Intention Sought by U.S. through Its Claim about "Missile Threat" from DPRK Flayed
articles.content:
Sinister Intention Sought by U.S. through Its Claim about "Missile Threat" from DPRK Flayed
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. warlike forces are making much ado about the "missile threat" from the DPRK while letting loose a spate of conjecture as they please. This is preposterous and robber-like logic. Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The United States, an assailant posing missile threat, is pulling up the DPRK which has fallen victim to it. This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The U.S. is reeling off a string of unreasonable and unilateral vituperation not understandable by the DPRK.  It is getting evermore frantic in its moves to increase military expenditure and step up arms buildup including the modernization of nuclear weapons and the space militarization with an aim to put the world under its domination.  However, it is finding fault with other countries in their efforts to increase their national defence capacity to cope with those moves.  
					
					 The U.S. warmongers force the DPRK to stop the missile development, claiming that it poses "threat" to the U.S. This is really a robber-like logic little short of urging the DPRK to remain bare-handed.
					
					 By raising a hue and cry over the "missile threat" from the DPRK the U.S. seeks a sinister intention. It seeks to overwhelm other powers by holding a military edge through the establishment of the missile defense system (MD). The U.S. moves to build a missile shield is touching off great concern and denunciation of the international community as it is a revelation of its criminal intention to destroy the strategic stability of the world and spark off a new arms race and a nuclear war. It is precisely for this reason that the warlike forces of the U.S. are hell-bent on publicizing the fictitious story about the "missile threat" from the DPRK in a bid to justify their moves to establish the MD and push forward with it in real earnest.
					
					 Now that the U.S. is clinging to the military strong-arm policy towards the DPRK while running amuck in its moves to establish the MD under the pretext of the non-existent "missile threat" from someone, the DPRK will build stronger war deterrent for self-defence, not caring what others say.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Holding Fast to Self-Reliance Principle
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Holding Fast to Self-Reliance Principle
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The principle of self-reliance should be held fast to in order to firmly defend sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation and vigorously advance the revolution and construction. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					 The history of building a rich and powerful country is the history of firmly defending the national dignity and glorifying it with the might of self-reliance, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					Self-reliance provides the DPRK with a sure guarantee for holding fast to its own line and policy in building a rich and powerful country.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea has always shaped line and policies independently from the Juche-oriented stand and has steadily carried them out.
					
					 Self-reliance is the most powerful way for increasing power of the country in every way.
					
					Now the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a dignified socialist country with strong national power. Had the DPRK not adhered to the principle of self-supporting in economy and self-reliance in national defence from its early days, it would not have defended itself in such grim ordeals as the "Arduous March" in the past and risen to the position of the powerful country as today.
					
					 Self-reliance precisely means patriotism providing the younger generation with cradle of genuine life and happiness.
					
					 Through the difficult and arduous struggle the DPRK people deeply realized that self-reliance only is what keeps them alive and the way for eternal victory and prosperity. The hearts of the people are full of warm patriotic enthusiasm and will to certainly build a dignified great prosperous powerful socialist nation in this land by their own strength, technology and resources and hand it down to posterity with pride.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Policy of Confrontation with DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Policy of Confrontation with DPRK Assailed
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea made public a statement on Oct. 22 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for its policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					 The statement recalled the fact that the Lee grouphas recently appointed Ryu Jong Ha as president of the Red Cross who has to perform a humanitarian role in improving the inter-Korean relations though he took the lead in sycophancy toward the U.S. and anti-reunification treacherous acts as minister of "Foreign Affairs" in the period of the "civilian" dictatorial regime. 
					
					 This action is aimed at blocking the reconciliation, unity, exchange and cooperation of the nation and thereby disturbing humanitarian undertakings between the south and the north, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The Lee group publicly pretends to "respect" the June 15 joint declaration and the Oct. 4 declaration but behaves quite contrary to this behind the scene by appointing to the above-said post an anti-reunification element steeped in the idea of confrontation to the marrow of his bones in a bid to persistently pursue the policy of confrontation with the DPRK, fellow countrymen and further strain the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The Lee group has perpetrated frantic suppression of progressive organizations for the reunification movement and figures devotedly struggling for the implementation of the above-said declarations under the pretext of "security" while conniving at the anti-reunification forces' scattering of leaflets and smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					The Lee regime should immediately fire Ryu, though belatedly, as he is a running dog of the anti-DPRK and anti-reunification forces.

articles.title: "Government's" Anti-Worker Policy Accused in S. Korea
articles.content:
"Government's" Anti-Worker Policy Accused in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions issued a statement on Oct. 22 condemning the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for pursuing a policy for big businesses against workers.
					 The statement accused the "government" of working hard to push forward the "measure for supporting construction" in a bid to zealously foster speculation in real estate of construction businesses under the pretext of "economic recovery."
					
					 This would bring excessive profits to the construction businesses while putting the construction workers in constant uneasiness about unemployment and a living crisis, added the statement.
					
					 It demanded the "government" roll back at once the above-said anti-worker policy but positively opt for taking measures to bring the living of workers and other common people to normal.

articles.title: Brigandish Aim Sought by U.S. in Transfer of Its Military Bases in S. Korea Disclosed
articles.content:
Brigandish Aim Sought by U.S. in Transfer of Its Military Bases in S. Korea Disclosed
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 22 at which it disclosed the brigandish aim sought by the U.S. in the transfer of its military bases in south Korea.
					 Speeches were made at the conference to be followed by the reading out of a press release.
					
					 The press release recalled the fact that the U.S. has recently pressurized the south Korean authorities to cut back its share of funds for the transfer of the bases by half as compared with the original share, extending the expiry of the term for the transfer of its military bases in south Korea.
					
					 Lurking behind this is an ulterior motive to divert the funds for the upkeep of the U.S. forces covered by the south Korean authorities to the purpose of transferring the bases and minimize the U.S. share of funds needed for realizing the "strategic flexibility" of its forces in south Korea, the press release said, and went on:
					
					 A stupendous amount of funds are expected to be used for the transfer of the bases but the U.S., not content with this, pressurizes the south Korean authorities to channel even the funds for the upkeep of its forces to the transfer of the bases.
					
					It is the robber-like demand for the U.S. to cut back its share of the funds for the transfer of its bases, while putting pressure upon south Korea to drastically increase the funds for the upkeep of its forces and trying hard to use them illegally. 
					
					 The "National Assembly" should resolutely check the U.S. robber-like demeanor.
					
					 The press release urged the authorities to strongly call to task those who met the above-said U.S. demand and recover all the funds and profits illegally amassed by the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					
					 It also demanded stop to the expansion of the U.S. military base in Phyongthaek for realizing the "strategic flexibility" and the repeal of the special agreement on the share of funds for the upkeep of the U.S. forces.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was brought out in pamphlet by the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea on Oct. 20.
					This work, published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990), clarifies the idea that the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea is a sure guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause, the issue of developing the WPK into a Juche-type revolutionary party and basic ways of performing the mission and duties of the party as a leading political organization and others.
					
					The pamphlet in a preface says that Kim Jong Il is the great leader who has developed the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung into an invincible party.

articles.title: Peerlessly Great Men Praised
articles.content:
Peerlessly Great Men Praised 
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Personages of Guinea, Egypt and Iran praised the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in leading the building of the Workers' Party of Korea, when addressing events held between Oct. 7 and 10 on the occasion of the 63rd founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 The general secretary of the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea in a lecture highly praised the President for laying down the line and strategy and tactics for the victorious advance of the cause of independence against imperialism through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 He stressed that in the closing years of the last century Kim Jong Il systematized the Songun idea fathered by the President and pursued the Songun politics in all fields, dealing telling blows at the imperialists, firmly defending the sovereignty of the country and nation and providing a weapon for the sure victory of the cause of independence against imperialism, an all-powerful treasured sword. 
					
					 The chairman of the Misr Arab Socialist Party of Egypt at round-table talks said that the WPK has firmly maintained the socialist principle and accumulated precious experience in the revolution and construction under the leadership of the President since its founding, adding that Kim Jong Il has successfully carried forward the President's cause.
					
					 The manager of the Iran－Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm at round-table talks said that the Korean people have made great successes in all fields of the revolution and construction, frustrating the U.S. unceasing sanctions and moves to stifle it, adding that this is the fruition of the WPK's seasoned leadership.

articles.title: Anniversary of Formation of DIU Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Formation of DIU Marked
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Cambodia and a seminar on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work, a film show, book and photo exhibitions and other events in Laos between Oct. 13 and 18 on the occasion of the 82nd anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibitions were famous works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos showing their immortal exploits.
					
					 The chairman of the Funcinpec Party of Cambodia in his speech at the meeting highly praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the greatest men who have led the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK to victory and glory.
					
					Officials of the Vientiane City Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union at a seminar proved in depth the validity of Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction."
					
					The participants of the film show watched a DPRK film showing the invincible might of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones de Corea y China
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones de Corea y China
Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar este lunes en esta capital las conversaciones entre la delegacion de la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la del Ministerio de Recursos Hidrologicos de la Republica Popular China.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion de la direccion mencionada encabezada por su titular Ko Il Hun y, por la china, los integrantes de la delegacion de susodicho ministerio presidida por el ingeniero-jefe Liu Ning.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el mayor desarrollo del intercambio y cooperacion cientifico-tecnicos entre si.

articles.title: CRC condena represion de banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRC condena represion de banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Consejo de Religiosos de Corea (CRC) hizo publica este lunes una declaracion denunciando a la banda de Lee Myung Bak que so pretexto de la "eliminacion de las fuerzas izquierdistas pro-Norte", levanta la ola de represion fascista contra las entidades progresistas y las personalidades de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea que apoyan la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y abogan por la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion. 
					Esta campana represiva deviene un acto cruel para estrangular la democracia, que contraviene diametralmente a la religion de los creyentes coreanos aspirantes a la justicia y la paz, a la reconciliacion y la reunificacion de la nacion, y la abierta violacion de derechos humanos, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					Las "fuerzas izquierdistas pro-Norte", a que se refiere la banda del traidor Lee, son las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion y las personalidades patrioticas que luchan contra las infames politicas antipopulares y las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida del actual "regimen" conservador y por la democratizacion de la sociedad surcoreana y la reunificacion independiente del pais. 
					
					Sin embargo, esa horda de traidores esgrime locamente el sable del fascismo mintiendo como si la justa lucha de los habitantes surcoreanos contra la importacion de la carne de vacas locas de Estados Unidos y por el derecho a la vida y la libertad se hubiera desatado por la "manipulacion trasera" de alguien. 
					
					Esta locura es tan infame e injustificable y los que viven de maldades seran condenados severamente por el pueblo.
					
					Apreciar la justicia y no conciliarse con la injusticia constituye el ideal comun de los creyentes y su mision religiosa. 
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, el CRC expresa la esperanza de que todas las entidades religiosas y los creyentes del Sur de Corea frustraran tajantemente las maniobras de represion fascista de la satanica banda de Lee Myung Bak y avivaran las llamas de la sagrada lucha patriotica por la democratizacion de la sociedad y la reintegracion territorial del pais.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica a EE.UU. por hablar de "amenaza de misiles"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica a EE.UU. por hablar de "amenaza de misiles"
 Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ATCC) -- En estos tiempos, las fuerzas belicistas estadounidenses no se cansan de hablar de la "amenaza de misiles" proveniente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presentando sus hipotesis erroneas. 
					 En un comentario individual difundido este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela que partiendo de esa logica de bandido, EE.UU., que amenaza realmente a la RPDC con misiles, trata de inculpar a esta victima.
					
					Son imposibles de convencer a la RPDC todas las opiniones tan absurdas y unilaterales de EE.UU., comienza el comentarista y prosigue: 
					
					Si bien el imperio impulsa demencialmente la modernizacion de armamentos nucleares, la militarizacion cosmica y otras maniobras de aumento de gastos militares y de fuerzas armadas para la hegemonia mundial, censura de una manera u otra a otros paises que fortalecen la capacidad de defensa nacional para hacer frente a ello.
					
					 Los belicistas estadounidenses exigen a la RPDC dejar de desarrollar los misiles porque esto representa una "amenaza" a EE.UU.
					
					 Esta logica de gangster es igual a mandar que nos rindamos sin ofrecer ninguna resistencia. 
					
					A traves del establecimiento del sistema antimisiles, EE.UU. trata de aventajarse a otras potencias en el terreno militar. 
					
					Pero, esta maniobra causa gran preocupacion y denuncia de la sociedad internacional porque partio del intento criminal de romper la estabilidad estrategica del mundo y desatar una nueva carrera armamentista y la guerra nuclear. 
					
					Por eso, las fuerzas belicistas estadounidenses se ven en la necesidad de difundir tanto ese fantasmal rumor de la "amenaza nuclear" proveniente de la RPDC para justificar el establecimiento del Sistema Antimisiles y acelerarlo en la etapa crucial. 
					
					 Dado que EE.UU. despliega mas desesperadamente el establecimiento del Sistema Antimisiles y recurre a la politica de coaccion militar contra la RPDC pretextando su "amenaza militar", esta consolidara mas y mas sus fuerzas disuasorias de guerra para la autodefensa sin hacer caso a lo que digan otros.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia a ministro de Defensa surcoreano
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia a ministro de Defensa surcoreano
Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ATCC) -- Como trascendidos, en la 40a "reunion consultiva anual para la seguridad" Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea, sesionada recientemente en Washington, Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos publicaron una "declaracion conjunta" de 17 articulos diciendo que "se preparan para la situacion emergente" de alguien.
					De acuerdo con el diario Rodong Sinmun, en esa cita EE.UU. y la banda de Lee Myung Bak exteriorizaron abiertamente su ambicion de agredir al Norte de Corea suponiendo atrevidamente una "situacion emergente". 
					
					Tanto a la luz del acto verbal de los belicistas como en vista de los asuntos discutidos, esa reunion  resulto la mesa de debate sobre las operaciones que se hace a punto de una guerra.
					
					Asi revela el comentarista en el articulo difundido este lunes en ese rotativo y prosigue: 
					
					Al volver a discutir los peligrosisimos planes de guerra persiguiendo su atrevida y necia ambicion, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos revelaron su intencion aventurera de perturbar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y provocar una nueva guerra cueste lo que cueste. 
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que?en la entrevista de prensa conjunta, concedida despues de la reunion mencionada, el ministro de Defensa titere del Sur de Corea Ri Sang Hui volvio a acusar atrevidamente a la RPDC.
					
					Esto muestra a que grado llegan la conciencia de confrontacion fratricida y el belicismo anti-RPDC de ese traidor de pesima calana que cansado de hablar en su casa de la supuesta "situacion emergente", viajo a su amo gringo y pronuncio a la vista del mundo unos chismes imposibles de reproducir.
					
					El disparate y conducta histerica de Ri Sang Hui traeran indudablemente consecuencias tan graves y practicamente estan llevando las ya exacerbadas relaciones Norte-Sur a una fase catastrofica dificil de remediar.
					
					Dejando intacto a Ri, vendepatria servil a EE.UU., maniaco de confrontacion y escoria humana, no se puede esperar jamas la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur ni la reunificacion pacifica.
					
					El pagara tarde o temprano el precio de sus imprudentes actos verbales. 
					
					Seria conveniente a la banda de Lee Myung Bak escuchar con seriedad la advertencia de la RPDC.
